definition[0]: to become calmer and less noisy or active, or to make someone or something do this
example[0]: Javed Miandad appealed for calm, but he failed to quieten the protesters.
example[1]: Quiet down and get ready for bed!
example[2]: Things tend to quieten down after Christmas.
definition[1]: to reduce a feeling such as fear or worry
example[3]: I managed to quieten her fears.
